bug.author: Mart10hub
bug.summary: Installing open3d python package from source on Windows produces error
bug.description:
Describe the bug <denchmark-code> Traceback (most recent call last): File "setup.py", line 108, in <module> zip_safe=False, File "C:\Vyoo\sources\Open3D\env\lib\site-packages\setuptools\__init__.py", line 129, in setup return distutils.core.setup(**attrs) File "C:\Program Files\Python36\lib\distutils\core.py", line 134, in setup ok = dist.parse_command_line() File "C:\Vyoo\sources\Open3D\env\lib\site-packages\setuptools\dist.py", line 499, in parse_command_line result = _Distribution.parse_command_line(self) File "C:\Program Files\Python36\lib\distutils\dist.py", line 472, in parse_command_line args = self._parse_command_opts(parser, args) File "C:\Vyoo\sources\Open3D\env\lib\site-packages\setuptools\dist.py", line 814, in _parse_command_opts nargs = _Distribution._parse_command_opts(self, parser, args) File "C:\Program Files\Python36\lib\distutils\dist.py", line 534, in _parse_command_opts if not issubclass(cmd_class, Command): TypeError: issubclass() arg 1 must be a class </denchmark-code>
Following the installation tutorial <denchmark-link:http://www.open3d.org/docs/compilation.html#windows>Ä¥ere</denchmark-link>
(using py launcher) py -3.6 -m venv env .\env\scripts\activate mkdir build cd build cmake -G "VisualStudio 16 2019" .. cmake --build . --parallel 4 --config Release --target ALL_BUILD cmake --build . --parallel 4 --config Release --target install-pip-package see error
Expected behavior I should be able to do python -c "import open3d" successfully after running step 7 Environment (please complete the following information):
OS: Windows 10 Python version: 3.6.7 Open3D version: as of commit eea7fd2 Is this remote workstation?: no How did you install Open3D?: Compiling from source and installing package with pip
Additionnal stuff:
Using Visual Studio 16 2019 CMake version 3.14.1 Python 3.6.7 Pip 19.0.3
I am compiling from source to disable OpenMP as described in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/intel-isl/Open3D/issues/797>#797</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/intel-isl/Open3D/issues/831>#831</denchmark-link>
Full log <denchmark-code>Microsoft (R) Build Engine version 16.0.461+g6ff56ef63c for .NET Framework Copyright (C) Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.
